sentence.Network_en: They wanted the store to have a folksy small-town image.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们希望这家商店具有小城镇那种朴实热情的形象。

sentence.Network_en: His folksy manner has endeared him to his neighbors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他平易近人的态度使他受到邻居们的喜爱.

sentence.Network_en: He was a folksy aged man, who had studied in Czechoslovakia once.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是位待人和气的中年人, 留学捷克斯洛伐克.

His folksy manner has endeared him to his neighbors ., 他平易近人的态度使他受到邻居们的喜爱.
the letter was peppered with the usual mix of witticismscore investment advice and folksy wisdom .像往年一样，巴菲特这封信中也包含着俏皮话、中肯的投资建议和民间智慧。
Folksy humor ; a folksy style that masked a keen business mind ., 低调的幽默 ; 以低调的形式掩盖着一种强烈的商业念头.

entry.tran: 朴素的;有民间风格的;土里土气的
entry.def: If you describe something as folksy, you mean that it is simple and has a style characteristic of folk craft and tradition. You sometimes use folksy to show disapproval of something because it seems unsophisticated.

example.tran: 朴素的乡村风味的家具

entry.def: If you describe someone as folksy, you mean that they are friendly and informal in their behaviour.

auth_sentence.content: He's being folksy, whatever he's wearing.
